channel.title: CiTR -- Son of Nite Dreems (2009)
channel.description: How many CiTR listeners remember tuning in to Vancouver cable 10 on Sunday evenings during the late 70's and early 80's to 'Nite Dreems', one of Canada's first Video Radio programs? Join me, Jolly John Tanner, in keeping the eclectic music all eras alive on Son of Nite Dreems, alternating Mondays from 6 to 7:30pm. Also, featuring UFO reports right here on CiTR 101.9 FM Vancouver.
channel.itunes:summary: How many CiTR listeners remember tuning in to Vancouver cable 10 on Sunday evenings during the late 70's and early 80's to 'Nite Dreems', one of Canada's first Video Radio programs? Join me, Jolly John Tanner, in keeping the eclectic music all eras alive on Son of Nite Dreems, alternating Mondays from 6 to 7:30pm. Also, featuring UFO reports right here on CiTR 101.9 FM Vancouver.
channel.itunes:author: CiTR 101.9 Vancouver

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Sept.7/09
item.description: Last program of this current series known as Son of Nite Dreems. Sort of a musical bio of some of jolly John's highlights over a 50 year radio career. Der Rosenkavalier's prelude, Anne Stephens, Teddy Bear's Picnic excerts some early musical influences to 50's instrumentals and beyond. LES BAXTER, Poor People of Paris....LES PAUL & MARY FORD, Vaya Con Dios....ELVIS PRESLEY, Blue Moon....ELVIS PRESLEY, Long Tall Sally...GENE VINCENT, BE BOP A LU LA....NERVOUS NORVUS, Transfusion....THE COASTERS, Searchin'....BUDDY HOLLY,That'll Be The Day....THE KINGSTON TRIO, Tom Dooley.... BILL PARSONS, All American Boy....BOBBY FREEMAN, Do You Want To Dance....CHUCK BERRY, School Day....ROY ORBISON, Only The Lonely....ufo report with Michael Strainic....... LITTLE DADDY & THE BACHELORS, Juniors Jerk....THE VICEROYS, Granny's Pad...BILLY J. KRAMER & THE DAKOTAS, Bad To Me.... THE NOCTURNALS, This Ain't Love...LIVERPOOL FIVE, Heart.... JIMI HENDRIX, 1983 a Merman I should turn to be.....MARTHA AND THE MUFFINS, On a Silent Summer Evening....DEATH CAB FOR CUTIE, Your Heart is an Empty Room....RODNEY GRAHAM, High and Lonesome...... HAPPY TRAILS AMIGOS
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/June 1/09
item.description: Classic Oldies from the 50's, 60's, 80's, 90's and NOW. Michael Strainic's UFO report will keeping you watching the skies!
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/May 18/09
item.description: In Memory of veteran radio broadcaster "Happy Pappy" Al Jordan Hear Al on C-FUN radio, 1966. Hear the latest alternative tunes with memories from the 40's, 50's, 60's til now plus the very latest UFO reports from around the world with Michael Strainic.
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son Of Nite Dreems/May 4/09
item.description: Lotsa new music plus memories from the past. Belated 90th birthday greetings to Pete Seeger as we hear from the Weavers(1951). Michael Strainic gives you the latest UFO reports from around the globe and jolly John spins the tunes. A.R.RAHMAN, Millionaire(Slumdog)...R.D.BURAMN, Ek Ladki Ko Dekha(1942 Love Story)...*K-OS, Burning Bridges...*THE TOMORROWS, Love Is Dead...CONDO FUCKS, Shut Downs...LITTLE JUNIORS BLUE FLAMES, Feelin' Good....LITTLE MILTON, Beggin'My Baby...*THE STRANGE MAGIC, The Universe Is Energy...*THE STRANGE MAGIC, Twelve In The Mirror..ROBYN HITCHCOCK & THE VENUS 3, Your Head Here...THE GO-BETWEENS, Statue...*LOLLI, All These Games...DEATH CAB FOR CUTIE, My Mirror Speaks...*THE PINK MOUNTAINTOPS, Closer To Heaven.... THE WEAVERS(PETE SEEGER), On Top Of Old Smokey...BOBBY TROUP Route 66...NELSON RIDDLE, Route 66(theme)...DEPECHE MODE, Route 66...*PULL, Frisbee...LOTUS PLAZA, Redoak Way......... Happy Trails from the Tanner Manor...now stay tuned for Gary K & RADIO FREE GAK.
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son Of Nite Dreems/April 20/09
item.description: Ever wonder if UFO's exist? They're out there, believe me I've seen a daylight disc and nocturnal lights in Kelowna. Join Michael Strainic for the latest reports from around the world. This episode has some great new music plus some blasts from the past. * CHEMISTRY OF COMMON LIFE, Golden Seal.. *THE BICYCLES, Sweet Petite...LUNA, Friendly Advice...LILY ALLEN, Chinese...*SOLARISTS, Night Signals...TOMMY SANDS, Teenage Crush...THE STEREOS, I Really Love You...THE TUNE WEAVERS, Happy, Happy Birthday Baby...WAVVES, No Hope Kids... TELEKINESIS, Tokyo....*JULIE DOIRON, Je Le Savais...WIRE, Mekon Headman...ROXY MUSIC, More Than This...*CIRCLESQUARE, Bombs Away, Away...*IMMACULATE MACHINE, Thank Me Later...SELECT CUTS FROM ECHO BEACH, Reverend Echo...*AC NEUMAN, Elemental...ELVIS PRESLEY, Milkcow Blues Boogie.... HANK WILLIAMS, Rockin Chair Money. Happy Trails Nite Dreemers.... Now let's listen to RADIO FREE GAK with Gary K. for awhile.
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son Of Nite Dreems/April 6/09
item.description: Welcome to "The House of Mystery" where UFO reports and music from across "Time & Space" are heard on alternating Mondays. *THE TAURUS INCIDENT, Unilec 1948...*THE TOMORROWS, Remember.. THE WONDERSTUFF, Full Of Life(Happy Now)...*DALANNAH GAIL BOWEN, Still Alive & Well...ANDREW BIRD, Oh No...*RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, Electric Slim And The Factory Hen...RAVEONETTES, Uncertain times plus My Boyfriends Back, THE ANGELS, My Boyfriends Back...*JUNIOR BOYS, Dull To Pause..*LOLLI, Vitamin Shoppe...NEW ORDER, Loveless...DEERHOOF, Family Of Others.... DEERHUNTER, Saved By Old Times...JOHN MARTYN, Solid Air... LINK WRAY, Rumble...*THE SURFDUSTERS, Save The Waves...TRICKY, Cross To Bear...*MOKA ONLY, Grown Man Troubles...NAT KING COLE with TV ON THE RADIO, Nature Boy... HANDSOME FURS, All We Want, Baby, Is Everything... Happy Trails...Now lets enjoy some of RADIO FREE GAK WITH GARY K ON CiTR.
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/March 23/09
item.description: Music and UFO's are in our skies these days. Michael Strainic, world expert on aerial phenomenon has some startling reports. Host jolly John Tanner fills the airwaves with music from the 50's to current times. ANIMAL COLLECTIVE, In The Flowers..... *AC NEWMAN, There Are Maybe Ten Or Twelve...JOHN MAYALL, The Laws Must Change...*COLLAPSING OPPOSITES, The Cost Of Music... *RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, Canadian Sunsets...*POPPY FAMILY, Beyond The Clouds...JOHNNY & THE HURRICANES, Red River Rock.... ROYALTONES, Flamingo Express...FIREBALLS, Torquay...LILY ALLEN Everyone's At It...*THE MAGNIFICENT SEVENS, Rise To Heaven... *JUNIOR BOYS, Parallel Lines...THE CURE, The Reasons Why.... *THE TOMORROWS, Jupiter Optimus Maximus...SKIP & FLIP, It Was I...HOLLYWOOD ARGYLES, Alley Oop...RAY SHARPE, Linda Lu...*THE BICYCLES, Oh No It's Love...*TRANZMITORS, Are You Gonna Take Me...HAPPY MONDAYS, Loose Fit. HAPPY TRAILS Now let's listen to a wee bit of RADIO FREE GAK with Gary K
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/March 9/09
item.description: Just ahead of a Full Moon and 11 days till Spring Equinox jolly John travels musically across time and space. World renown UFO expert Michael Strainic with startling news of strange objects visiting our planet, an exciting report on RIGOLETTO by Willy Miles-Grenzberg singing excerpts from the current Vancouver Opera Production. The Tanner Manor celebrates 50 years of radio broadcasting with music from many eras. WIRE, Four Long Years...BELLE AND SEBASTIAN, Like Dylan At The Movies...*JULIE DOIRON, When Brakes Get Wet...STONE ROSES, I Wanna Be Adored...*GREAT LAKE SWIMMERS, Encore...*EVAN SYMONS, Woke Up In My Grave...CARL PERKINS, I'm Sorry, I'm Not Sorry...FATS DOMINO, Ain't That A Shame..MAJOR LANCE, Um, Um, Um, Um, Um, Um...*THE HERMIT, The Breeze...THE PSYCHEDELIC FURS, The Ghost In You...*JULIE DOIRON, Lovers Of The World...DEERHUNTER, Little Kids...LILY ALLEN, Fear...UFO REPORT...THE LEGENDARY PINK DOTS, Rainbows Too?...RIGOLETTO episode...*DALANNAH GAIL BOWEN, Mama's Got The Blues...THE WAILERS, Tall Cool One...THE SHADOWS, Round And Round...THE FRANTICS, Fog Cutter...(EMP, EXPERIENCE MUSIC PROJECT) Happy Trails Enjoy Radio Free GAK with Gary K.
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Feb.9/09
item.description: The BBC reports on a new rocky planet discovered around another star.(At least 303 so far) *THE PEGGY LEE ORCHESTRA, All I Really Want To Do....getting you in the mood for another episode of the Mysterious Traveller, jolly John Tanner saluting UBC civil Engineering students with MERCURY REV, Senses On Fire...TALKING HEADS, Stay Hungry...DAVID BYRNE & BRIAN ENO, One Fine Day...*DESTROYER, Blue Flower/Blue Flame.. *RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, You Gotta Be An Animal/Quality Street... *THE BICYCLES, I'll Wait For You...SONIC YOUTH, Jams Run Free... BUDDY HOLLY, Well Alright... THE CRICKETS, Don't Cha Know... RITCHIE VALENS, In A Turkish Town...BUDDY HOLLY & THE HOLLIES, Peggy Sue Got Married... JOHN MARTYN, Bless The Weather...ATTENTION WATCHERS OF THE SKIES...Michael Strainic reports on the latest UFO sightings around the world....FRANK ZAPPA, Lumpy Gravy Pt.1.......... DEERHUNTER, Cover Me(Slowly)Agoraphobia...*AC NEWMAN, Prophets...*CIRCLESQUARE, Stop Talking(So Many)..MARY WELLS, You Beat Me To The Punch...MARVIN GAYE, Pride and Joy...Celebrating Tamla/Motown's 50th and Black Pride Month. HAPPY TRAILS Nite Dreemers....Now enjoy a sample of RADIO FREE GAK with Gary K.
item.itunes:subtitle: RadioRadio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Jan.26/09
item.description: Tonight's transmission transcends from BBC robot feature from Opera presentaion of CARMEN at the Queen E. Theatre back to the 50's...plus UFO reports with Michael Strainic worldwide!! Join jolly John Tanner's tribute to the"Three Stars" <Buddy Holly, Ritchie Valens and J.P. Richardson, "The Big Bopper">, who died in a plane crash 50 years ago on February 3rd/1959. *PLANTS & ANIMALS, Guru/Sinnerman...*GIRL NOBODY, I'll Shake It...TOMMY DEE & CAROL KAY, The Three Stars...RITCHIE VALENS, Come On Let's Go, Donna, La Bamba...BUDDY HOLLY, It's So Easy, Think It Over, Rave On...THE BIG BOPPER, Chantilly Lace, EDDIE COCHRAN, The Three Stars...*JUNIOR BOYS, FM (Tensnake Remix)...JULEE CRUISE, Falling...*TOKYO POLICE CLUB, The Harrowing Adventure...KRAFTWERK, Neon Lights...*VALUE VILLAGE PEOPLE, Feliz Navi Dada...*THE DEARS, Disclaimer... from Seattle's "Experience Music Project" JOE BOOT & THE FABULOUS WINDS...THE COUNTS, Turn On Song. fini HAPPY TRAILS *CND followed by Gary K & Radio Free GAK....<><>
item.itunes:subtitle: RadioRadio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Jan.12/09
item.description: Jolly John gets into 2009 musical favorites plus some of the best from 2008 right back to the 50's, including a 50th anniversary salute to Tamla/Motown, radio themes from even farther back in time, Dark Matter Man checks the night sky and Michael Strainic enters the strange world of UFO's with reports from Pennsylvania, New Jersey, Australia and Lincolnshire, UK. (ufo crash) Tonights Tunes.....*RON SEXSMITH, Spiritude & This Is How I Know...TIM BUCKLEY, Look At The Fool...*MOKA ONLY, Carrottro...THE GREEN HORNET & BENNY GOODMAN, Themes Like Old Times....DAVID BOWIE, Life On Mars...BUCANNAN & GOODMAN, Flying Saucer #2... SHEB WOOLEY, Purple People Eater...DEATH CAB FOR CUTIE, Bixby Canyon Bridge...*YOUNG GALAXY, Lost In The Call... *BROKEN SOCIAL SCENE presents KEVIN DREW...Underneath The Skin & Lost In The Call...HELPING HAND & RICHARD DIAMOND... T.L.O.T....THE CURE, Underneath The Stars...*THE TAURUS INCIDENT, Unilec 1892...NIRVANA, All Apologies...*BLACK MOUNTAIN, Night Walks...*CONSTANTINES, Trans Canada...*THE CHOIR PRACTICE, I See Things...MARV JOHNSON, You Got What It Takes...THE MARVELETTES, Please Mr. Postman...FRANK ZAPPA, Don't Eat The Yellow Snow. *Canadian<<>> NEXT SHOW JANUARY 26th features a rebroadcast of the original NITE DREEMS from February 1980. Happy Trails
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Dec.29/08
item.description: Prelude to a New Year reminiscing 2008's musical masterpeices, 50'& 60's classics, resolutions for 2009 plus lumps of coal for the bad guys. Again Michael Strainic bends the mind with UFO reports from around the world. KAISER CHIEFS, Tomato In The Rain...*RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, The Singer Couldn't Make It.. *HAWAIIAN BIBLES, Main & Hastings...EVERLY BROTHERS, Bye, Bye Love..MARTY ROBBINS, A White Sports Coat...JIMMY DORSEY ORCHESTRA, So Rare...*TOKYO POLICE CLUB, Centennial...*THE DEARS, Dream Job...*TOKYO POLICE CLUB, Listen To The Math... RADIOHEAD, House Of Cards...*JONI MITCHELL, Shine...UFO News M83, Kim & Jessie...VAMPIRE WEEKEND, Oxford Comma.... *DESTROYER, Dark Leaves Form A Thread...BILLY WILLIAMS, Gonna Sit Right Down And Write Myself A Letter...THE SATURDAY NIGHTS, Ticonderoga...DON RONDO, White Silver Sands...*THE AWKWARD STAGE, Only Good Days Caught On Camera *THE STILLS, Hands On Fire...GENE VINCENT, Bluejean Bop... EDDIE COCHRAN, Somethin'Else. Happy Trails with 10 minutes of Radio Free GAK, with Gary K.
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Dec.15/08
item.description: PRE-XMAS SPECIAL....Wishing all a Sumptuous Saturnalia........ Michael Strainic has the latest worldwide UFO update <<<<>>>> Jolly John features the VALUE VILLAGE PEOPLE Festive season CD throughout todays program, plus original radio themes... *POINTED STICKS, Christmas Time Again...THE CAMEOS, Merry XMAS *PAT DEIGHAN & THE ORB WEAVERS, Here Too Long...THEMES LIKE OLD TIMES...BOBBY THE POET, White Xmas...THE DRIFTERS, White Xmas...AUGUST DARNELL, Xmas On Riverside Drive...THEMES L.O.T. *THE FALCONS, Jingle Bell Rock...STAN FREBERG, Green Xmas.....*JONI MITCHELL, Strong And Wrong...T.L.O.T....*CHAD VANGAALEN, Inside The Molecules...BEATLES, Revolution #9...... *THE FALCONS, YE MERRY GENTLEMEN...*POINTED STICKS, Power Pop Santa...T.L.O.T.....DEPECHE MODE, Personal Jesus. Happy Trails from the Tanner Manor *Canadian
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Dec.1/08
item.description: Good to be back after a few weeks in Seattle, San Diego and Mexico. Many thanks to Morgan Tanner for filling in on the November 17th pledge drive program. This edition features a visit from Vancouver singer/songwriter Elizabeth Fischer of DARK BLUE WORLD and our UFO report with Michael Strainic. The Experience Music Project/Science Fiction Museum and Hall of Fame in Seattle is a highly recommended location to visit. Pick up the 'WILD AND WOOLY' CD, featuring 47 musical selections from the 50's to present day.(featuring somd 60's hits on this program) Musically speaking.....BLOC PARTY, Better Than Heaven *THE DEARS, Money Babies...THE DAVE LEWIS TRIO, Davids Mood Pt2...THE BEL-AIRS, Mr. Moto...THE VICEROYS, Grannys Pad... *ANIMAL SLAVES, Chinese Restaurant...*DARK BLUE WORLD, Demimonde...ERIC BURDON & THE ANIMALS, We Gotta Get Out Of This Place...*THE TAURUS INCIDENT, Unilec 1054...DEAD CAN DANCE, Indus...JODY REYNOLDS, Endless Sleep...*RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, Why Look For Good Times...THE DANDY WARHOLS, Primary...*TRANZMITORS, Live A Little More... THE SMITHS, Girlfriend In A Coma...*THE TAURUS INCIDENT, Unilec 1056...*MOKA ONLY, Starfish...LITTLE RICHARD, The Girl Can't Help It...GENE VINCENT, Be Bop-A-Lula. *Canadian Tunes* Happy Trails
item.itunes:subtitle: RadioRadio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Nov.3/08
item.description: Something new and some blasts from the past including a post Halloween salute with jolly John and dark matter man, plus a overview of recent ufo sightings with Michael Strainic. * denotes Canadian talent RADIOHEAD, Reckoner...*DESTROYER, Shooting Rockets(From The Desk Of Night's Ape)...JOHN ZACHERLE, Dinner With Drac. Pt1..SCREAMIN' LORD SUTCH, She's Fallen In Love With The Monster Man...THE VERVE, Valium Skies..*RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, Afternoon Nap...*BROKEN SOCIAL SCENE presents KEVIN DREW, Fucked Up Kid...*THE ORGAN, Don't Be Angry...*THE DEARS, Disclaimer/ Dream Job...*THE STILLS, I'm With You...THE DRIFTERS, When My Little Girl Is Smiling...EARL JEAN, I'm Into Something Good... TV ON THE RADIO, Halfway Home...PRIMAL SCREAM, The Glory Of Love...*THE BUTLESS CHAPS, Broken Transit, Broken Soil..*THE MODELOS, It's Getting Tough...LARRY WILLIAMS, Short Fat Fannie...BILL HALEY & HIS COMETS, Skinny Minnie... Join Morgan Tanner for the Nov.17th, CiTR FUND DRIVE. JT's back Monday, December 1st. Happy Trails
item.itunes:subtitle: RadioRadio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Oct.20/08
item.description: While the skies are clear check out Venus low in SW half hour past sunset with Jupiter SSW a little later. UFO's over state of Georgia and overseas in Wales and W.Ireland are just a few of the many strange sightings from Michael Strainic. Jolly John's musical menagerie...WIRE, One Of Us...*TRANZMITORS, Who's Gonna Tell Mary...BEACH BOYS, In My Room...ROY ORBISON, Love Hurts...*BEDOUIN SOUNDCLASH, Walls Fall...*THE TOP DRAWERS, Midnite Vanity...DEATHCAB FOR CUTIE, I Will Possess Your Heart...*CHAD VANGAALEN, Bones Of Man...SONIC YOUTH, The Neutral...*THE COAST, Nueva York...SIGUR ROS, Inni Mer Syngur Vitley Singur...*THE AWKWARD STAGE, I Love The Ones That Love Me...THE FLEETWOODS, Come Softly To Me...RICKY NELSON, Poor Little Fool...CHARLATANS, Mistakes...*GHOSTKEEPER, Mr. No Show...YO LA TENGO, The Race Is On...*PAT DEIGHAN & THE ORB WEAVERS, Anna Marie...CHUCK WILLIS, CC Rider...FREDDY KING, Hideaway. *Cdn. Happy Trails
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Oct.6/08
item.description: Where else can you hear the latest music from then and now, keep a heavenly eye on the planets with the latest news from the world of ufo's with Michael Strainic? Another daylight disc over O'Hare airport, and Australia's N.Territories are blitzed. Join jolly John Tanner's manor for THE CURE, The Only One...*YOU SAY PARTY, WE SAY DIE, Opportunity...JOHNNY OTIS, Barrel House Blues...EDDIE COCHRAN, Eddies Blues....... *RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, Canadian Sunset...*The NEW PORNOGRAPHERS, Adventures In Solitude...THE NATIONAL, Fake Empire...THE BREEDERS, Night Of Joy...*AVAAZ, You Have A Choice...(avoid voting for harper)*THE HIDDEN CAMERAS, Death Of A Tune..... *THE STILLS, Hands On Fire...BILL MUNROE & HIS BLUE GRASS BOYS, Blue Moon Of Kentucky (1946)...ELVIS PRESLEY, Blue Moon Of Kentucky (1954)...FLEET FOXES, Sun It Rises...*CONSTANTINES, New King...LEE SCRATCH PERRY, Shine...*THE ORGAN, Even In The Night...RICHARD BERRY & THE PHARAOHS, Louie, Louie (1956)...ROCKIN ROBIN ROBERTS & THE WAILERS, Louie, Louie (1961) *Canadian <<<>>> Happy Trails
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Sept.22/08
item.description: Jolly John loves cats, ufo's, music from down under and outer space in the planetarium.....Michael Strainic has news of ufo sightings in BC and across the continent, yes Astronomers have seen ufo's. Clyde Tombaugh, discoverer of Pluto saw a cigar shaped object in 1949. The Tanner manor salutes UVic climate scientist Andrew Weaver's new book on global warming "Keeping Our Cool: Canada in a Warming World. Now the music, which speaks volumes<> ATMOSPHERE, You...*MOKA ONLY, Speakers...DENNIS WILSON, River Song...*HANK PINE & LILY FAWN, North America...BILL DOGGETT, Honky Tonk Pt 1...LLOYD PRICE, I'm Gonna Get Married...*THE TAURUS INCIDENT, UNILEC 1572...*PSI DREAM, The Taurus Incident...ROBERT FORSTER, Let Your Light In, Babe...*YOUNG GALAXY, Lazy Religion...STEREOLAB, Chemical Chords...*THE AWKWARD STAGE, Only Good Days Caught on Camera...PRIMAL SCREAM, Beautiful Future...*THE ORCHID HIGHWAY, Opiate...LOU REED, Perfect Day...*JONI MITCHELL, If...*THE STUNT MAN, The Libra Incident. *Canadian Happy Trails
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Sept.8/08
item.description: The Tanner manor features "Showbiz Shayne" reporting on the upcoming Vancouver Film Festival, UFO reports from China, airliner buzzed over Texas and bigfoot sightings in Houston,BC from Michael Strainic plus Dark Matter Man salutes UBC Astronomer, Brett Gladman on his co-discovery of 2008 KV42, a 50km wide chunk of ice and rock in a very strange orbit of our solar system. Then there's tonights tunes to stir the soul........ the B52'S, Eyes Wide Open....*ARCADE FIRE, The Well And The Lighthouse...RENMINBI, After A Day...*SLOAN, Cheap Champagne.. SPIRITUALIZED, Baby I'm Just A Fool...*BLACK MOUNTAIN, Wild Wind...THE BEATLES, Sexie Sadie...JIMI HENDRIX, Like A Rolling Stone...*the NEW PORNOGRAPHERS, Go Places...*DESTROYER, Foam Hands...JO STAFFORD (1952), You Belong To Me...MARTIN DENNY, Quiet Village (1959)...*KEVIN DREW with BROKEN SOCIAL SCENE, Farewell To The Pressure Kids...DEATH CAB FOR CUTIE, Cath...STEREOLAB, Neon Beanbag...*RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, (Not My) Finest Hour.... Happy Trails *Canadian talent
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Aug.25/08
item.description: Summer's slowly slipping with ufo's overhead across the world planetman in the Tanner manor/ Michael Strainic on aerial phenomenon in our skies..google ufojoe... with vast realms of music spanning time and space. ie: CLINIC, Lee Shan...*THE STILLS, Don't Back Down...BECK, Replica...*TELEPATHIC BUTTERFLIES, A Midlife Crisis...ELECTRIC FLAG (1968), Groovin' Is Easy... WOLF PARADE, California Dreamer..*VANCOUGAR, Lonely Life... BARBARA LYN (1962), You'll Lose A Good Thing...MY MORNING JACKET, I'm Going To Scream Pt2...NEW ORDER, Vanishing Point.. *HAWAIIAN BIBLES, Don't Wanna Give It up...THE DANDY WARHOLS Love Song...*DESTROYER, Leopard Of Honor...RADIOHEAD, Dollars And Cents...*MY INDOLE RING (1968) Orange Float Petals...THE DRIFTERS, There Goes My Baby...DEL VIKINGS, Whispering Bells...*YOUNG & SEXY, Peer Through...... Happy Trails *denotes Canadian
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/Aug.11/08
item.description: This time too tall Tanner previews some of the amazing Vancouver bands performing on 4th Avenues "summer of love" Satuday, August 16 from 11 am to 6:30 pm., plus a summer salute from 1958. Dark matter man reminds one and all about the Perseid meteor shower August 11/12 and Michael Strainic checks ufo sightings around the world. Todays tunes: THE NATIONAL, Apartment Story...*RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, Electric Slim & The Factory Hen...DEPECHE MODE, Enjoy The Silence...*THE WEAKERTHANS, Sun In An Empty Room...*SEEDS OF TIME, Supergirl MOBY, Hyenas...STAN FREBERG, St. George And The Dragonet...FRANK SINATRA, I've Got You Under My Skin...R.E.M., Houston...RADIOHEAD, Reckoner...*UNITED EMPIRE LOYALISTS, Buffalo Wilke...*MELODIC ENERGY COMMISSION Doorway Into Summer...*BRAINCHILD, Manifest Destiny...*THE FALCONS, Rebel Jukebox...*THE POINTED STICKS, American Song... RICKY NELSON, Stood Up...GENE VINCENT, Git It...EDDIE COCHRAN, Summertime Blues. *Canadian Happy Trails
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/July 28th
item.description: Memories of Pemberton & Vancouver Folk Festivals, Red Robinson, 1966 C-FUN radio, with reports of UFO's from Michael Strainic, sky reports, sci.fi and memorable music from across the universe with jolly John Tanner. DEATH CAB FOR CUTIE, Bixby Canyon *THE HERMIT, The Breeeze....BELL X1, Trampoline...*THE AWKWARD STAGE, The Sun Goes Down On Girlsville...LITTLE JUNIORS BLUE FLAMES, Feelin' Good...*THE TAURUS INCIDENT, Unilec 1056...... CHUCK BERRY, Carol...LILLY ALLEN, Nan, You're A Window Shopper *DNA6, Megalodon...VAMPIRE WEEKEND, Cape Cod Kwassa Kwassa... *LSD49, Gas...WE ARE SCIENTISTS, Spoken For...*RODNEY GRAHAM BAND, The Singer Couldn't Make It...THE ZOMBIES, Summertime *NO KIDS, The Beaches All Closed...BO DIDDLEY, Bo Diddley... ELVIS PRESLEY, Heartbreak Hotel...BUDDY HOLLY, Not Fade Away ..THE KILLS, Getting Down...*BELLA, Didn't Mean To Break Our Love...*ISLANDS, Creeper. Happy Trails with Howdy Doody *Canadian
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/July 14
item.description: Join jolly John Tanner's musical menagerie from across time & space. A worldwide epidemic of UFO sightings is examined by Michael Strainic and Dark Matter Man gazes at the night sky. Now the MUSIC...RADIOHEAD, 15 Steps...*WOLF PARADE, Soldier's Grin....THE B52s, Funplex...*GREEN HOUR BAND, Silent Madame............................................. MICHAEL FRANTI & SPEARHEAD, Yell Fire...THE BREEDERS, Istanbul...*CHAD ALLAN & THE REFLECTIONS, Got A Funny Feeling...*GARNET SWEATSHIRT, Cockatoo...*MELODIC ENERGY COMMISSION, Escargot...RENMINBI, Big Sur...*DESTROYER, Dark Leaves Form A Thread...GENE VINCENT, Crusin...NERVOUS NORVUS Transfusion...M83, Graveyard Girl...*VANCOUGAR, Obvious... DUBBLE STANDART, Love Can Grow...*PLANTS & ANIMALS, Good Friend...ROXY MUSIC, More Than This. HAPPY TRAILS! *Canadian
item.itunes:subtitle: Radio Radio

item.title: Son of Nite Dreems/June 30/08
item.description: Jolly John still in the saddle with the latest UFO info from Michael Strainic. Australian Territories experiencing many strange sightings. Of course the music's foremost starting off with: THE CHARLATANS(live), Oh Vanity...*HAWAIIAN BIBLES, There's Good People In The City....B52's, Deviant Ingredient... *DESTROYER, My Favorite Year...MASTER MUSICIANS OF JAJOUKA. item.title: Radio Radio
item.description: Disc Jockeys over the edge, as Nimrod, son of JBShayne, freaks out, totally trashing Tanner (jolly John) at every chance. Plus UFO reports on the rise! Details of Guernsey Island ufo's, April 23/07, from Michael Strainic (CUFOS) & MORRISSEY, The More You Ignore Me, The Closer I Get....YOUNG GALAXY, Outside The City...PETER, BJORN and JOHN, Young Folks...BLONDIE, Hanging On The Telephone....BOOK OF LISTS, Journey East...RUFUS WAINWRIGHT, California.. LCD SOUND SYSTEM, North American Scum...JARVIS COCKER, Fat Children... FEIST, I Feel It All...OF MONTREAL, A Sentence Of Sorts In Kongsvinger... MOTHER, MOTHER, Neighbour...BJORK, Hunter. Fini Next Program Monday, May 21st...............................
item.itunes:subtitle: Son of Nite Dreems

item.title: Radio Radio
item.description: Perfect foreground for the dinner hour, family and pet friendly, environmentally and socially conscious. Sparkling conversation, profound life-lessons, celebrity guests, cinematic concerns, famed ufologist Michael Strainic and of course, the very best in popular music from most genres, current & past. Tonight's tunes.... ARCADE FIRE, Keep the Car Running.....PULP, Common People....MOTHER, MOTHER, Train of Thought....DAMIEN RICE, Rootless Tree....LITTLE DADDY & the BACHELORS, Juniors Jerk....AMY WINEHOUSE, Back to Black....YOUNG GALAXY, No Matter How Hard You Try....THE STOOGES, Trollin'....MODEST MOUSE, Missed the Boat....BJORK, Who is It?....APOSTLE OF HUSTLE, National Anthem of Nowhere. NEXT PROGRAM MONDAY MAY SEVENTH...........................................
item.itunes:subtitle: Son of Nite Dreems

item.title: Radio Radio
item.description: While Nimrod takes a break tonite, Too Tall Tanner Time Travels toward Taurus. Michael Strainic with an all Canadian UFO report (featuring flying Triangles) MUSIC makes the world go round with THE JUNIOR BOYS, FM (Tensnake remix) THE DEARS, Hate then Love...JERRY LEE LEWIS with NEIL YOUNG, You Dont Have to go...GENE VINCENT, Woman Love...EDDIE COCHRAN, Am I Blue?...GENE VINCENT, Get It...EDDIE COCHRAN, Nervous Breakdown...YOU SAY PARTY, WE SAY DIE, Monster...TEDDY THOMPSON, The Future...RODNEY GRAHAM, She Failed To See the Point...OTIS SPANN, Evil Ways...JOHNNY OTIS, Barrel House Blues...RAY CHARLES, Rockin' Chair Blues...CHAMPION JACK DUPREE, Everybody's Blues...DONNIE McDOUGALL, Turn Up the Music...THE NOCTURNALS, Uptown...NO LUCK CLUB, Better Times Will Come. Happy Trails See you in 2 weeks.
item.itunes:subtitle: Son Of Nite Dreems

item.title: Radio Radio
item.description: Radio Vetrans Too Tall Trash Tanner & Son of Shayne-Cpt.Midnite Nasty Nimrod just back from Hollywood North featuring THEN & NOW in the world of music! SIPREANO with DECAF and STUNT MAN, Third Beach...PETER BJORN and JOHN, Roll the Credits, Poor Cow...SIPREANO, The Lunatics (are taking over the asylum) RICKIE LEE JONES, Elvis Cadillac...BLOC PARTY, Kreuzberg...MOTHER MOTHER, Polynesia...The ZOMBIES, Whenever You're Ready, She Loves the Way They Love Her...AMY WINEHOUSE, Rehab...THE BRESNARD LAKES ARE THE DARK HORSE, Devastation...ECHO & THE BUNNYMEN, Rescue...ARCADE FIRE, Antichrist Television Blues...MARIANNE FAITHFUL, Strange Weather...THE AWKWARD STAGE Heaven is For Easy Girl...BRIAN FERRY, The Cruel Sea Captain..Next show April 9th, 2007. My Apologies to the Zombies and fans for mixing up ROD ARGENT & COLIN BLUNDSTONE. Of course ROD plays keyboards and COLIN is lead vocalist!!!!!
item.itunes:subtitle: Son Of Nite Dreems

item.title: Radio Radio
item.description: Applogies for lack of NIMROD, Son of Shayne, snowblinded atop Cyprus Bowl. Too Tall Trash Tanner, wise, experienced, veteran/survivor of local commercial radio wars for almost half a century presents perfect foreground for the dinner hour. Family and pet friendly, envronmental and socially conscious music of the spheres plus ufo fanatic Michael Strainic. YO LA TENGO, The Story of Yo La Tango....SKINNY PUPPY, Haze... ROBYN HITCHCOCK, Underground Sun...SIPREANO, Big League....HOWLIN WOLF, Little Red Rooster...ELDORADOS, At My Front Door...DEADCATS, Vampire Cats... KATE BUSH, Nocturn....NOCTURNALS, You Lied...THE ZOMBIES, i Love You...THE LEMON HEADS, Let's Just Laugh...ENNIO MORRICONE, Good, The Bad and the Ugly...YOUNG GALAXY, Come And See...SONIC YOUTH, Pink Steam...THE WINKS, Slumber Party Lets Go. FINI
item.itunes:subtitle: Son Of Nite Dreems

item.title: Radio Radio
item.description: Dark Matter Man accompanies Nimrod, son of Shayne(Cpt.Midnite) with ufo info and a myriad of music from across the ages of alternate musicial melodys.... Camera Obscura, If Looks Could Kill...The Bughouse Five, Bricks and Stone... Deerhoof, +81...The Replacements, Valentine...Justin Rutledge, Emily Returns... Tom Waits, Sea of Love... Sparkle Horse, Ghost in the Sky...Julie Doiron, Woke Myself Up...Sonic Youth, Kim's Chords...Mother Mother, Dirty Town...The Shins, Girl Sailor...The Stooges, Loose..Amy Winehouse, He Can Only Hold Her... Apostle of Hustle, My Sword Hands' Anger.
item.itunes:subtitle: Son Of Nite Dreems

item.title: Radio Radio
item.description: Special Guest: Randy Rampage, "Looney Tunes, D.O.A., Stress Factor 9". Hosted by Nimrod, son of semi-legendary Vancouver dj J.B.Shayne & "Jolly" John Tanner (long John) vetran radio dj - both partners in "Nite Dreems", 1976-1983 Western Canada's first video-radio program, which featured D.O.A. live in the studio and video-taped on location around Shaunessey and Kitsilano in 1980. PLAYLIST 6-7:30 pm. Sparks, Arcade Fire, Broadcast, D.O.A., T-Rex, Lloyd Cole, Pere Ubu, Scotties cut and paste-project, The Roots, Stress Factor 9, Deerhoof, Sufjan Stevens & the Raveonettes.
item.itunes:subtitle: Son Of Nite Dreems

item.title: Radio Radio
item.description: Irrereverent psyco-babble from semi-legendary J.B.Shayne's son, Nimrod, plus B.C. radio pioneer, jolly John Tanner. The strange world of ufo's is examined 40 minutes into the program with Vancouver's Michael Strainic. Music lineup........... The Dears, Death or Life we want you...Brazilian Girls, Last Call...The Pointed Sticks, Out of Luck...Pulp, Babies...Jane Birkin, Waterloo Station...Darryl Reimer, Still Crazy...Beruit, Scenic World...Television, Friction....Lily Frost, Season's Song. ..Pere Ubu, Texas Overture...Sparkle Horse, Shade and Honey...Tokyo Police Club, Cheer it On...Lee Scratch Perry, I am a Psychiatrist.
